descript.abstract: This dataset, prepared for use in the Interactive Forestry Atlas of Indonesia (2009), displays the largest lakes and reservoirs of Indonesia. This dataset is a subset of the global product called the Level 1 Global Lakes and Wetlands Database (GLWD), produced by the World Wildlife Fund (WWF). It comprises the shoreline polygons of the largest lakes (area >= 50 square km) and reservoirs (storage capacity >= 0.5 cubic km) worldwide, including extensive attribute data. The original GLWD database may be accessed online at http://www.worldwildlife.org/science/data/item1877.html.
descript.purpose: GLWD-1 represents a global polygon map of large lakes to which existing lake registers, compilations or remote sensing data can be linked and georeferenced.

citeinfo.origin: Bernhard Lehner, World Wildlife Fund US
citeinfo.title: Global lakes and wetlands database, level 1
citeinfo.othercit: Please cite as: Lehner, B. and Doell, P. (2004): Development and validation of a global database of lakes, reservoirs and wetlands. Journal of Hydrology 296/1-4: 1-22.

citeinfo.title: Interactive Atlas of Indonesia's Forests
citeinfo.othercit: Susan Minnemeyer, Lauriane Boisrobert, Fred Stolle, Y. I. Ketut Deddy Muliastra, Matthew Hansen, Belinda Arunarwati, Gitri Prawijiwuri, Judin Purwanto, and Rakhmat Awaliyan. 2009. Interactive Atlas of Indonesiaâ€™s Forests (CD-ROM). World Resources Institute: Washington, DC.

timeperd.current: Based on various data sources, mostly 1970s to 1990s.

idinfo.useconst: Restricted to non-commercial scientific, conservation and educational purposes.
idinfo.datacred: Bernhard Lehner and Petra Doell. World Wildlife Fund US, Washington DC, USA. Center for Environmental Systems Research, University of Kassel, Germany.

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Unique polygon identification number.
Assigned type: Lake or Reservoir.
Name of lake or reservoir.
Name of dam.
Source of polygon outlines (see data documentation).
Surface area in square km, as calculated from polygon outlines.
Perimeter in km, as calculated from polygon outlines.
Longitude of polygon center in degrees.
Latitude of polygon center in degrees.
Mean elevation in meters, as derived from HYDRO1k.
Watershed (catchment) area in thousand square km, as derived from HYDRO1k.
Mean inflow into lake or reservoir in cubic meters per second (see data documentation).
Reservoir volume (storage capacity) in cubic km.
Source of reservoir volumes (see data documentation).
Main country of lake or reservoir center.
Other countries of lake or reservoir (see data documentation).
Name of dammed river.
Name of nearest city to dam.
Type of lake, as provided by MGLD (see data documentation).
Surface area in square km, as provided by MGLD (see data documentation).
Surface area in square km, as provided by LRs (see data documentation).
Source of LRS_AREA (see data documentation).
Catchment area of reservoir in square km, as provided by ICOLD.
Height of dam in meters.
Year of completion of dam.
Main purpose/use of reservoir (see data documentation).
Second purpose/use of reservoir (see data documentation).
Third purpose/use of reservoir (see data documentation).
